item.title: Some Stats
item.description: Since the launch of TestSendr, we have been working hard to improve the service and to make it more and more efficient. We have also been working on the documentation to make it more complete and easier to understand. We are happy to share with you some stats about the service.
item.content:encoded:
Since the launch of TestSendr, we have been working hard to improve the service and to make it more and more efficient. We have also been working on the documentation to make it more complete and easier to understand. We are happy to share with you some stats about the service.

March is not yet done but it's already the biggest month for TestSendr. We are happy to see that the service is growing and that more and more people are using it.

item.title: First Launch
item.description: We are happy to launch the first version of TestSendr, the tool that will help your QA team to build efficient email ðŸ“¬ testing scenarios! Don't forget to get a look at our Quick Start page to understand how to use the service.
item.content:encoded: We are happy to launch the first version of TestSendr, the tool that will help your QA team to build efficient email ðŸ“¬ testing scenarios! Don't forget to get a look at our Quick Start page to understand how to use the service.
